name: xp-observer
description: This class is used to provide object observing functionalities.
author: ExpandJS <dev@expandjs.com> (http://expandjs.com)

scripts.build: npm run build:browserify && npm run build:minify && node noconflict
scripts.build:browserify: browserify index -i expandjs --standalone XPObserver | derequire > dist/xp-observer.js
scripts.build:minify: browserify -d index -i expandjs --standalone XPObserver -p [minifyify --map xp-observer.min.map --output dist/xp-observer.min.map] | derequire > dist/xp-observer.min.js
